features.title: Resources
features.subtitle: Full icon generator: ICO/PNG/WebP, PWA and Windows assets

privacy.title: Total Privacy
privacy.description: Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy

download.title: Instant Download
download.description: Download ICO, full package and Windows assets

windows_assets.title: Windows Store assets
windows_assets.description: targetsize 16–96 (incl. 20/24), tiles and StoreLogo; with unplated and canonical names.

organized_zip.title: Organized ZIP
organized_zip.description: Assets/ subfolders: Taskbar, Tiles and StoreLogo.

about.title: About
about.description: IcoSmith is a tool that turns PNG, JPG/JPEG, SVG, WebP, GIF/APNG (first frame), AVIF, BMP and ICO into .ICO.

free.title: 100% Free
free.description: Forever free. No accounts. No tricks.

open_source.title: Open Source
open_source.description: MIT licensed. Built in the open. Contributions welcome.

privacy.title: Private by Design
privacy.description: Local processing. Your data never leaves your device.

hero.title: IcoSmith
hero.description: Favicon generator and converter: PNG/JPG/SVG → ICO (16–256), PWA package (manifest + apple‑touch‑icon) and Windows Store assets (taskbar/tiles/StoreLogo).
hero.formats: Supports: PNG, JPG/JPEG, SVG, WebP, AVIF and BMP.

upload.title: Drag your image here
upload.subtitle: or click to select
upload.constraints: PNG, JPG/JPEG, SVG, WEBP, GIF, AVIF, APNG, BMP or ICO

processing.success_subtitle: Your icons are ready for download

validation.unexpected: Unexpected error during validation. Please try again.
validation.corrupted: Corrupted or invalid file format. Please try another image.
validation.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
validation.unknown: Unexpected error. Please try again or use another file.
validation.rate_limit: Too many uploads in a short time. Please wait a moment.
validation.processing_timeout: Processing took too long. Please try with a smaller image.
validation.svg_too_nested: SVG has too many nesting levels (max 50).

suggestions.file_type: Try converting your image to PNG or JPG.
suggestions.file_size: Resize or compress the image to reduce its size.
suggestions.dimensions_too_small: Use an image with a higher resolution.
suggestions.dimensions_too_large: Resize the image to be smaller than 4096x4096px.
suggestions.corrupted: The file seems to be damaged. Try exporting it again.
suggestions.svg_too_large: Use an SVG editor to reduce the file size.
suggestions.svg_too_complex: Simplify the SVG by removing unnecessary elements.
suggestions.svg_too_nested: Reduce the nesting level of SVG elements.
suggestions.generic: Try reloading the page or using a different file.

processing.generic_suggestion: It seems something went wrong. Please try again.

preview.title: Conversion Complete!
preview.subtitle: Your favicon is ready to use

grid.title: Icon Preview
grid.subtitle: Click any icon to see usage details

details.title: Selected Resolution Details
details.no_selection: Select an icon to see details

processing.error_toast_description: Try again with a valid PNG or JPG file

windows.info: Windows taskbar and Store assets are included when enabled in options.

small_icon_profile.sharp_hint: Boost edges/contrast. Good for bold logos.
small_icon_profile.soft_hint: Soften and preserve thin strokes. Good for fine logos.

small_icons.thin: At 16/32px it looked thin. Try the Sharp profile.
small_icons.bold: At 16/32px it looked heavy. Try the Soft profile.

hints.post_result.not_satisfied: Not what you expected? Tweak settings and try again.

preset_recommend.title: Recommended: PWA
preset_recommend.desc: Large image detected. Apply PWA preset (192/512 + manifest)?
preset_recommend.desc_win: You recently used Windows/Electron. Keep this preset?
